text: Being a financial person you won’t give up easily. You are used to trying to understand billions & even trillions — different of course, but your mind is already better prepared.

text: We have little hope of truly understanding time scales involved. We humans have an almost infinitely smaller life spans. So, once we have to think about stellar evolution and the lifetimes of stars we tend to give  up. The idea of billions of years is hard to deal with.

text: Excellent idea. I’m off to bed early. I will think more about a warmer Siberia later. You will not be like Spain, but certainly more comfortable spring and summer and fall, but also far less harsh winters.
author: pebblerick

text: So what will you do today?
author: pebblerick

text: One hopes you will not become too warm.
author: pebblerick

text: I looked it up — you are at 56 degrees north latitude. So in less than 10 years you will be warmer, but not too warm.
author: pebblerick

text: So, in the long run, you are the lucky one.
author: pebblerick

text: Tucson is about 32 degrees N and where you are is about 57 N. You. Will get warmer but it will take another 8-10 years. I will become too hot.
author: pebblerick

text: Not lucky — just much closer to equator.

text: If you have a good air circulation in your house, you may be able to get suitable filters that will trap most of the particulates out of the air that comes into the house. You may be changing filters often. Maybe you already have such a filtration system?
author: pebblerick

text: I knew that from fact you burn coal. Chinese are going to try switching to solar — they have burned so much coal their air quality is typically 3-5 times worse than ours. Same is true of India.
author: pebblerick

text: Russia is a complete blank on my maps for air quality index. This means that either air quality index is not routinely measured or Russia does not give numbers to the rest of the world.
author: pebblerick

text: I am going to check air quality index in your region. It may change if you are getting more polluted air coming in from the South.
author: pebblerick

text: So, I told you more that you probably wanted to know. Sorry about that.
author: pebblerick

text: As the earth get’s warmer we’ll see many complications. The Earth will develop new routines to get increasingly warmer air off the equator, but poles are warming and usual mechanisms will change. By 2040-2050 we’ll likely have surprising effects — unless we can slow warming.
author: pebblerick

text: Do you have good sunshine?
author: pebblerick

text: Couple more degrees and you are going to begin to feel warm. Nice weather for a long walk.
author: pebblerick

text: In this way, when we have cold spring you will have a warmer than usual spring. It’s a reciprocal effect so it can go the  other way as well. There are other effects as well — some we know about others we don’t.
author: pebblerick

text: Springs in Siberia is warmer while we are colder. Think one effect is from high air pressures in Northern Canada are steering cold arctic air into southern Canada & Northern U.S. That will tend to bring warmer Asian air north into your region.
author: pebblerick

text: Yes — Arctic is opening up a lot. Doesn’t mean it will get real warm quickly but may start to be warmer is spring more quickly. The tree line is moving north in Siberia as it is in Northern Canada. But the weather will not follow consistently.
author: pebblerick

text: Should get little warmer as morning becomes afternoon. May get over +10 C. That’s usual winter temperature in my part of Arizona at 11 in morning.
author: pebblerick

text: You are probably seeing some early Spring flowers by now??
author: pebblerick

text: Could give you more of an explanation, but I suspect you’d rather just enjoy the weather and not analyze it.
